entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
